wind_speed.docs:
The information for the wind speed sensor.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the wind speed sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  



*See also: [TX20/TX23 Wind Speed/Direction Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tx20.html#configuration-variables)*

wind_direction_degrees.docs:
The information for the direction in degrees sensor.
  * **name** (**Required**, string): The name for the direction sensor.
  
  * **id** (*Optional*, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Set the ID of this sensor for use in lambdas.
  
  * All other options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).
  
  



*See also: [TX20/TX23 Wind Speed/Direction Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tx20.html#configuration-variables)*

pin.docs:
**[Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin, where the black or brown cable are connected.



*See also: [TX20/TX23 Wind Speed/Direction Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/tx20.html#configuration-variables)*
